languages.text: "Верно, верно..." {n}Абеляр хмурится.{/n} "Проще сказать, чем сделать, конечно. Но уже то, что один из наследников Леди Теодоры жив, внушает хотя бы немного оптимизма".

traits.locale_text: "Верно, верно..." {n}Абеляр хмурится.{/n} "Проще сказать, чем сделать, конечно. Но уже то, что один из наследников Леди Теодоры жив, внушает хотя бы немного оптимизма".

languages.text: "Indeed, indeed..." {n}Abelard frowns.{/n} "That is easier said than done, of course. But seeing one of Lady Theodora's heirs alive inspires at least some degree of optimism."
languages.original_text: "Верно, верно..." {n}Абеляр хмурится.{/n} "Проще сказать, чем сделать, конечно. Но уже то, что один из наследников Леди Теодоры жив, внушает хотя бы немного оптимизма".

traits.locale_text: "Indeed, indeed..." {n}Abelard frowns.{/n} "That is easier said than done, of course. But seeing one of Lady Theodora's heirs alive inspires at least some degree of optimism."

"Indeed, indeed..." {n}Abelard frowns.{/n} "That is easier said than done, of course. But seeing one of Lady Theodora's heirs alive inspires at least some degree of optimism."
"Indeed, indeed..." {n}Abelard frowns.{/n} "That is easier said than done, of course. But seeing one of Lady Theodora's heirs alive inspires at least some degree of optimism."

languages.text: “确实如此，确实如此……”{n}阿贝拉德皱起了眉头。{/n}“当然，这件事情说起来容易做起来难，但看到西奥多拉夫人的继承人还活着，这确实会让人变得乐观起来。”
languages.original_text: "Indeed, indeed..." {n}Abelard frowns.{/n} "That is easier said than done, of course. But seeing one of Lady Theodora's heirs alive inspires at least some degree of optimism."

traits.locale_text: “确实如此，确实如此……”{n}阿贝拉德皱起了眉头。{/n}“当然，这件事情说起来容易做起来难，但看到西奥多拉夫人的继承人还活着，这确实会让人变得乐观起来。”

languages.text: «En efecto, sí...». {n}Abelard frunce el ceño.{/n} «Por supuesto, es más fácil decirlo que hacerlo. Al menos, ver que un{mf||a} de los herederos de lady Theodora sigue con vida me incita al optimismo».
languages.original_text: "Indeed, indeed..." {n}Abelard frowns.{/n} "That is easier said than done, of course. But seeing one of Lady Theodora's heirs alive inspires at least some degree of optimism."

traits.locale_text: «En efecto, sí...». {n}Abelard frunce el ceño.{/n} «Por supuesto, es más fácil decirlo que hacerlo. Al menos, ver que un{mf||a} de los herederos de lady Theodora sigue con vida me incita al optimismo».

languages.text: 「確かに、その通りです…」{n}アベラルドは眉をしかめた。{/n}「もちろん、言うは易く行うは難しですが。しかし、シオドーラ様の後継者の一人が生きているのを見るといくらか楽観的な気持ちになります」
languages.original_text: "Indeed, indeed..." {n}Abelard frowns.{/n} "That is easier said than done, of course. But seeing one of Lady Theodora's heirs alive inspires at least some degree of optimism."

traits.locale_text: 「まったくそのとおりだ…」{n}アベラルドは眉をしかめた。{/n}「言うは易く行うは難しですよ、もちろん。しかし、レディ・テオドラの後継者の一人が生きているのを見るといくらか楽観的な気持ちになります」
「確かに、その通りです…」{n}アベラルドは眉をしかめた。{/n}「もちろん、言うは易く行うは難しですが。しかし、シオドーラ様の後継者の一人が生きているのを見るといくらか楽観的な気持ちになります」

languages.text: « En effet, en effet... Bien sûr, la parole est plus facile que les actes, {n}dit Abélard en fronçant les sourcils,{/n} mais voir l'{mf|un|une} des {mf|héritiers|héritières} de dame Théodora en vie est déjà une petite source d'optimisme en soi. »
languages.original_text: "Indeed, indeed..." {n}Abelard frowns.{/n} "That is easier said than done, of course. But seeing one of Lady Theodora's heirs alive inspires at least some degree of optimism."

traits.locale_text: « En effet, en effet... Bien sûr, la parole est plus facile que les actes, {n}dit Abélard en fronçant les sourcils,{/n} mais voir l'{mf|un|une} des {mf|héritiers|héritières} de dame Théodora en vie est déjà une petite source d'optimisme en soi. »

languages.text: "Wohl wahr, wohl wahr ..." {n}Abelard verzieht das Gesicht.{/n} "Das ist natürlich leichter gesagt als getan. Aber dass einer von Lady Theodoras Erben noch lebt, gibt immerhin Anlass für ein wenig Optimismus."
languages.original_text: "Indeed, indeed..." {n}Abelard frowns.{/n} "That is easier said than done, of course. But seeing one of Lady Theodora's heirs alive inspires at least some degree of optimism."

traits.locale_text: "Wohl wahr, wohl wahr ..." {n}Abelard verzieht das Gesicht.{/n} "Das ist natürlich leichter gesagt als getan. Aber dass einer von Lady Theodoras Erben noch lebt, gibt immerhin Anlass für ein wenig Optimismus."

languages.original_text: "Indeed, indeed..." {n}Abelard frowns.{/n} "That is easier said than done, of course. But seeing one of Lady Theodora's heirs alive inspires at least some degree of optimism."

languages.text: "Kesinlikle, kesinlikle." {n}Abelard kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "Lakin söylemesi kolay, icraatı zor. Her şeye rağmen Leydi Theodora'nın vârislerinden birini sağ görmek insana biraz olsun iyimserlik aşılıyor doğrusu."
languages.original_text: "Indeed, indeed..." {n}Abelard frowns.{/n} "That is easier said than done, of course. But seeing one of Lady Theodora's heirs alive inspires at least some degree of optimism."

traits.locale_text: "Kesinlikle, kesinlikle." {n}Abelard kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "Lakin söylemesi kolay, icraatı zor. Her şeye rağmen Leydi Theodora'nın vârislerinden birini sağ görmek insana biraz olsun iyimserlik aşılıyor doğrusu."
